titleStmt.title: We have brought our hoggs to a fair market. Or, The iron age turned into gold. See they obey our Gracious Soveraigns words, presto they'r gone; and now these wicked rogues look like the withered face of an old hagg, but with three teeth, like to a triple gagg, never published by any pen before. By J.A. A lover of his countryes welfare.
titleStmt.author: J. A.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
